ROW.NAME: 开票与申报比对不符（按月）

ROW.DATDSC: --开票与申报比对不符 select rownum, t.* from (select nvl(a.shxydm,a.id) nsrsbh, a.name nsrmc, b.kpje, b.zzs_kpje, b.ptfp_kpje, b.sbje, b.cyje, b.kp_sb_bl, -- a.hy_mc, (select hymc from DM_GY_HY hy where dj.hy_dm=hy.hy_dm and hy.yxbz='Y')hymc, (select nsrztmc from DM_GY_NSRZT zt where dj.nsrzt_Dm=zt.nsrzt_dm ) nsrztmc, (select swryxm from DM_GY_SWRY swry where swry.swry_dm=dj.SSGLY_DM)ssglymc, (select name from v_swjg where substr(dj.zgswskfj_dm,1,7)=id) zgswjg, (select swjgmc from DM_GY_SWJG jg where dj.zgswskfj_dm=jg.swjg_dm)zgswskfjmc from tax_company a,( select t1.nsrsbh, sum(t1.sbje) sbje, sum(t2.kpje) kpje, sum(t2.zzs_kpje)zzs_kpje, sum(t2.ptfp_kpje)ptfp_kpje, (sum(t2.kpje)-sum(t1.sbje)) cyje, (case when sum(t1.sbje)!=0 then round(nvl(sum(t2.kpje),0)/sum(t1.sbje),4) else nvl(sum(t2.kpje),0) end) kp_sb_bl from ( select b.nsrsbh,to_char(skssqq,'yyyymm') sbyf,sum(jsyj) sbje from sb_sbxx a,dj_nsrxx b where a.djxh=b.djxh and a.ZSXM_DM='10101' and a.skssqq>=to_date('[%DAT1]','yyyy-mm-dd') and a.skssqz<=to_date('[%DAT2]','yyyy-mm-dd') and a.zgswskfj_dm like '14511%' and a.gzlx_dm_1 in ('1','5') and a.ZFBZ_1 = 'N' group by b.nsrsbh,to_char(skssqq,'yyyymm')) t1, (select xfsbh,kpyf, sum(je) kpje, sum(decode(pz,'专票',je,0))zzs_kpje, sum(decode(pz,'普票',je,0)) ptfp_kpje from ( select xfsbh,kpyf,'专票'pz,sum(je) je from DZDZ_FPXX_zzsfp /*增值税发票*/ where XF_QXSWJG_DM like '14511%' and kpyf>=to_char(to_date('[%DAT1]','yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyymm') and kpyf<=to_char(to_date('[%DAT2]','yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyymm') and ZFBZ!='Y' group by xfsbh,kpyf union all select xfsbh,kpyf,'普票'pz,sum(je) je from DZDZ_FPXX_ptfp /*普通发票*/ where XF_QXSWJG_DM like '14511%' and kpyf>=to_char(to_date('[%DAT1]','yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyymm') and kpyf<=to_char(to_date('[%DAT2]','yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyymm') and ZFBZ!='Y' group by xfsbh,kpyf ) group by xfsbh ,kpyf) t2 where t1.nsrsbh=t2.xfsbh(+) and t1.sbyf=t2.kpyf(+) -- and t1.nsrsbh='914511007451444555' group by nsrsbh ) b ,(select * from dj_nsrxx ) dj where b.nsrsbh=a.id(+) and a.djxh=dj.djxh(+) and kp_sb_bl>1 and kpje>10000 and (substr(a.swjg_dm,1,7) in('[%ZGSWJG]') or substr(a.swjg_dm,1,7) in (select swjg.id from V_SWJG swjg start with swjg.id='[%ZGSWJG]' connect by prior swjg.id=swjg.sjid)) order by kp_sb_bl desc )t
